alert.note: Alert for Grant; Sioux (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 9:02AM CDT until July 30 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Sioux County in south central North Dakota... Southeastern Grant County in south central North Dakota... * Until 1015 AM CDT/915 AM MDT/. * At 902 AM CDT/802 AM MDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Carson to 10 miles southeast of Elgin, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Sioux and southeastern Grant Counties, including the following locations... Standing Rock, Leith, St. Gertrude and Standing Rock Nation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
